name: Tank Thunder
description:
Kill enemies to get orbs. Bring orbs to the teleport to get SCORES.

The more orbs you take (maximum is 10), the less speed and shoot rate you get.

Bring as much orbs to the teleport as you can! Each time you get orbs to the teleport your health/speed/shoot rate restores. Go on!

Co-op for 2 players is available (2d payer needs gamepad).

Made for Ludum Dare 40 with @new-mecha
